about_the_game:
American Tier III cruiser USS Charleston is a durable warship with ten 152 mm guns to deliver consistent firepower. While lacking torpedoes, her solid armor and large health pool help her withstand enemy attacks. Reliable and resilient, Charleston is a great choice for Captains seeking a sturdy cruiser. This exclusive bundle will strengthen your fleet and ensure you're battle-ready.

This package includes:

  • American Tier III cruiser USS Charleston
  • 2x Stars 'n' Stripes permanent camouflages
  • 375,000 Credits
  • x14 "Credits +40%" expendable economic bonuses
  • x14 "Ship XP +200%" expendable economic bonuses
  • x14 "Commander XP +200%" expendable economic bonuses
  • x14 "Free XP +600%" expendable economic bonuses
  • x15 Charlie Kilo signal flags
  • x15 Victor Lima signal flags
  • x15 India X-Ray signal flags
  • x15 Sierra Mike signal flags
  • x15 November Foxtrot signal flags
  • Port slot
  • Commander with 3 skill points

Get it at a 90% discount until February 27, 2025 within the 4-in-1 Bundle, then still enjoy a 40% discount until March 6, 2025. Available until March 31, 2025, this time-limited DLC bundle is a must-have for Captains seeking power and flexibility on the high seas. Don’t miss out on this incredible deal!

Disclaimer: This exclusive offer is only available for World of Warships accounts created through Steam.
